Title: Loving Annabelle
Writer: Katherine Brooks, Olivia Bohnhoff Harris (additional screenplay), Karen Klopfenstein (additional screenplay)
Actors: Erin Kelly, Diane Gaidry, Laura Breckenridge, Michelle Horn
Plot: Annabelle is the wise-beyond-her-years newcomer to an exclusive Catholic girls school. Having been expelled from her first two schools she's bound to stir some trouble. Sparks fly between ...
